charges.charge_description: 21:846 &; 841(a)(1) &; 18:2 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 46 months impr. as to ct. 1-5 all cts. to run concur. for a total of 46 months impr. credit for time served, if any as determined by the BOP. Ct. recommends FCI Oxford, WI or other facility close to Milwaukee, WI. SR: 5 yrs as to cts. 1-5. To run con cur. for a total of 5 yrs. SR. w/conditions see judgment for details. SA: $500.00 &; Restitution $6,795.00 jointly w/codefts. See judgment for schedule of payments

charges.charge_description: 21:846 &; 841(a)(1) &; 18:2 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: as to counts 1,4,5&;6 deft. to serve 90 months impr. All counts to run concur. for a total of 90 months impr. credit for time served as determined by the BOP. Court recommends FCI Fairton or Fort Dix. deft. to participate in drug treatment program.SR: 4 yrs as to ct. 1 and 3 yrs as to cts. 4-6. Terms to run concur. for a total of 4 yrs SR.w/conditions see judgment for details.SA: $400.00. Restitution: $2,475.00 joint and several w/codefts. see judgment for schedule of payments &; payee.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 846, 18:2 CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE  conspiracy to possess w/intent to dist. heroin(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: SENT: 12 mos. and 1 day as to each of counts 1 &; 5, to run concurrently for a total term of 12 mos. and 1 day imprisonment. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 yrs. as to each of counts 1 &; 5, to run concurrently for a term of 3 yrs. RESTITUTION: $200. FINE: $1,000. SA: $200.

charges.charge_disposition: SENT: 12 mos. and 1 day as to each of counts 1 &; 5, to run concurrently for a total term of 12 mos. and 1 day imprisonment. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 yrs. as to each of counts 1 &; 5, to run concurrently for a term of 3 yrs. RESTITUTION: $200. FINE: $1,000. SA: $200.
